function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Generation of noisy data for covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Failure to detect asymptomatic covid-19 cases in ct images","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent international regulations for covid-19 chest ct image data sharing","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor data quality and sharing in covid-19 chest ct image analysis","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Requirement for change of regulations to track contact-persons","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ethical framework and acceptable use of emerging technologies","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in contact tracing process, including identification, privacy violation, and monitoring.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical addresses, street names, and identification cards for contact-persons.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased exposure of contact tracing personnel to covid-19 and potential stigmatization.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis of people’s migration patterns leading to privacy concerns and ethical implications","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of contact tracing data for unethical purposes","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on technology for covid-19 detection and monitoring","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited use of ai technologies due to lack of data for tracking and prediction of covid-19 cases","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of rt-pcr test kits leading to delays in covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate and unreliable ai forecasting models due to noisy and limited data","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Search string focusing on contagious diseases could lead to biased results and miss important studies related to other diseases or areas of research.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exclusion of nonpeer-reviewed articles and studies in other languages with no english translation might lead to language and publication bias.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on ai algorithms for quality assessment may overlook important nuances and context in the evaluation of research articles.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Quarantine-induced reduction in physical activity energy expenditure","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of stay-at-home on physical and mental health","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health impacts of lack of access to exercise and physical activity","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased physical activity energy expenditure during quarantine","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels during the pandemic","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low physical activity levels among italian adults, especially during covid-19 quarantine","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges of maintaining physical activity levels during gender and age groups during quarantine.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in physical activity behavior compared to pre-pandemic levels","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Percentage increase
